response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, which has been meticulously crafted and carefully nurtured over time, represents a significant investment of resources and effort. I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, believing that its true worth aligns closely with this figure. I trust that you will find its qualities and potential to be far-reaching and beneficial. Should you decide to proceed, I am confident that we can arrange a mutually agreeable transaction. I look forward to your consideration and response.", "product_price": 950000}
